Fun Commands:: hack  - `Hacks` a tagged user or word
fight    - **DISABLED** Starts a 'fight' with a tagged person
Miscellaneous Commands:: purge   - Deletes x amount of messages in the text-channel (requires `Manage Message` permission)
reload   - Attempts to reload either all cogs or a certain cog (requires `Admin` permissions)
botinfo   - Displays some information about Sentinel
changelog - Displays changes made to Sentinel
Mod Commands:: mute   - Mutes a user (requires `Kick Members` permissions)
unmute    - Unmutes a muted user (requires `Kick Members` permissons)
kick  - Kicks user from the server (requires `Kick Members` permissons)
ban   - Bans user from the server (requires `Ban Members` permissons)
unban    - Unbans a banned user from the server (requires `Ban Members` permissions)
